title: How do i get new client

replies.body:
As *Para* mentioned, it's only live on OCE right now on the live servers. It's coming pretty soon, so hang tight until the Open Beta officially hits the NA region.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZgpbbQ6c,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-16T03:18:48.133+0000)
>
> As *Para* mentioned, it's only live on OCE right now on the live servers. It's coming pretty soon, so hang tight until the Open Beta officially hits the NA region.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

are there going to be bug fixes and new animations when the client enters beta for the alpha testers??
Not yet.  Only PBE and OCE right now but the next 24hrs, it may be available to NA.
